entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 02:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
